name: Outro
_source: speak;;You completed the map in 15 or less turns! You got the full reward!;;;hint
speak;Reimu;Alright, it looks like the entrance to the Netherworld is up ahead.
speak;Kasen;You know, I don't think we ever sent an advance notice to them, did we?
speak;Marisa;It's fine. We're all friends anyway!
speak;Alice;Friends is an interesting word, but I suppose we are all acquainted.
speak;Kasen;I suppose that's true...hopefully it all works out fine.
